summary:
Replaces Skyrims load screens with a simple load screen which has the Skyrim emblem at the center of the screen.
Now with Unofficial Skyrim Patch support.
descriptionHtml:
[center][img]http://i.imgur.com/rVhnipy.png[/img][/center]
[center][b]BY CHILICHINCHILLA[/b][/center]

[center][b]DESCRIPTION[/b][/center]
This is my own load screen it replaces Skyrims load screens with a simple load screen which has the Skyrim emblem at the center of the screen, this mod also removes the smoke from the bottom of the load screen including the start menu. The emblem is stationary by default but you can install Brumbeck's [url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/7801/?]Main Menu Spinning Skyrim Emblem[/url] to make the load screen's emblem spin.

[center][b]UPDATES[/b][/center]
[center]v1.1 - I've tested my mod at different resolutions to check it works ok (which I forgot to do before uploading). I found that the emblem when spinning disappears for a splitsecond during rotation the bug should be fixed now.

Added a version of my mod for the [url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/19/?]Unofficial Skyrim Patch[/url] which disables the load screen it adds, it's under optional files in the download section.[/center]

[center][b]INSTALLATION[/b][/center]
[center]Extract the archive into the skyrim folder replacing any existing files.[/center]

[center][b]UNINSTALLATION[/b][/center]
[center]Just delete all the mods files.[/center]

[center][b]TOOLS USED[/b][/center]
[center]BSAopt, Creation Kit, Nifscope, SWiX.[/center]
author: ChiliChinChilla

files.name: Chili's Load Screen For Unofficial Skyrim Patch
